name: my-gh-component
description: A Javascript (or Typescript) component for Grasshopper

scripts.build: npx path-exists-cli ./index.ts && npx esbuild ./index.ts --bundle --outdir=dist --platform=node --sourcemap=inline || npx esbuild ./index.js --bundle --outdir=dist --platform=node --sourcemap=inline
scripts.dev: npx path-exists-cli ./index.ts && npx esbuild ./index.ts --bundle --outdir=dist --platform=node --sourcemap=inline --watch || npx esbuild ./index.js --bundle --outdir=dist --platform=node --sourcemap=inline --watch
